name: Darker than Dark
description:
This game is best experienced with headphones!

Controls : 

  • Move with WASD or ZQSD
  • Shout with left mouse click button
  • You can skip the intro with left mouse click button

Find your way out of dark mazes using the power of echolocation. 

Any sound will reveal your surroundings, whether it comes from your steps or the mechanical noise made by the guardian drones.

This prototype contains 5 levels. Each one will step up the difficulty. 

Will you make it out alive?
